alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 11:42PM MDT until July 11 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAAKON...NORTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...JACKSON... NORTH CENTRAL BENNETT AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1138 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Grindstone to 9 miles northwest of Potato Creek, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet. At 1120 PM MDT, a 79 mph wind gust was reported 3 miles northwest of Scenic. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Potato Creek, Philip, Snake Butte, Kadoka, Hisle, Eagle Nest Butte, Long Valley and Belvidere. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 114 and 172. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington
